entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries or drizzle late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
